message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a great price! It's a one-time offer, and I'm only selling it to you for $100. I'm confident you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, but I'm not sure about this product. I need more information before I can make a decision.

I completely understand your hesitation! Let me tell you, this product is a great value for the price. It's a limited edition item, and I'm only selling it to you for $100 because I want to clear out some space in my inventory. I'm willing to throw in a special bonus gift with the purchase, worth $20, if you decide to buy it now. What do you say?
Thanks for the offer, but I'm still not convinced. I appreciate the bonus offer, but I need to be sure about the quality before I make a purchase.

I understand your concerns about quality, but I assure you that this product is a great deal. I've had many satisfied customers who have purchased similar products from me and loved them. In fact, I'm so confident in this product that I'm willing to give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with the product, I'll give you a full refund. What do you say? Is it worth the risk for a potential $20 bonus?

Thank you for the guarantee, but I still need more concrete information about the product's quality before I'm willing to take a chance. Can you provide any details about the product itself or any customer reviews that support your claims?

I understand your need for more information, and I'm happy to provide some concrete details. This product has received rave reviews from many customers who have purchased it from me in the past. In fact, I have a testimonial from a satisfied customer who is willing to share their experience with you. Would you like to hear it? Additionally, I can offer you a free consultation with the product's expert, who can answer any questions you may have about its features and benefits. And, as always, I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. What do you think?

Thank you for the information, but I'm still hesitant. While testimonials and consultations are helpful, I would feel more comfortable making a decision if you could provide some objective evidence about the product's quality. For example, can you share any data on the percentage of satisfied customers who purchased similar products or any independent reviews from reliable sources?

I understand your request for objective evidence, and I appreciate your cautious approach. Unfortunately, I'm a small seller, and I don't have access to the kind of data you're looking for. However, I can tell you that this product is a well-known brand in the industry, and many people have purchased similar products from me in the past. I'm willing to make a bold statement: I'm so confident in this product's quality that I'm willing to offer you a 50% refund if you're not completely satisfied with it. That's how much I believe in its value. What do you think?

While I appreciate the 50% refund offer, I'm still not comfortable making a purchase without more concrete information. You mentioned the product is from a well-known brand. Could you please share the brand name so I can research it independently? I'd also like to see if there are any independent reviews or reports on the product's quality. I understand you're a small seller, but having this information would greatly increase my confidence in making a purchase.

I understand your concerns, and I appreciate your diligence in researching the product. Unfortunately, I'm a small seller, and I don't have the ability to share the brand name or any independent reviews. I can tell you that the product is from a reputable company, but I don't have any concrete evidence to back that up. However, I'm willing to make a deal with you. If you're willing to take a chance on this product, I'll throw in a second product of equal or greater value absolutely free. That's a $200 value for the price of $100. What do you say?

I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. While a free second product is tempting, I need to be sure about the quality of the first product before I commit. I'm willing to wait until I see more evidence about the product's quality before making a decision.

I understand your concerns, and I respect your decision to wait for more evidence. I'd like to offer you a unique opportunity to experience the quality of this product firsthand. I'll give you a special 'test drive' option, where you can use the product for a limited time and see for yourself how it performs. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return it and get a full refund. This way, you can take a calculated risk and make a more informed decision. And, as always, I'm offering it to you for the same price of $100. What do you think?
That's a great offer! I'm willing to try the 'test drive' option. I'll be able to make a more informed decision about the product's quality this way. Thanks for your flexibility!

I'm glad you're excited about the test drive option! Since you've already experienced the quality of the previous product, I'm confident that this one will meet your expectations as well. I'll give you the same 'test drive' offer, and I'm sure you'll be impressed with its performance. Plus, I'll throw in a special bonus gift worth $20, just for being a valued customer. What do you say?
I'm happy with the 'test drive' option and the bonus offer. I'll give it a try and see how it goes!

I'm glad you're excited about the new product! However, I want to be upfront with you - this one is a bit of a departure from our usual standards. It's a limited edition item, and I'm only offering it to you because I think you'll appreciate its unique features. I'm willing to make a special deal on this one - I'll give you a 25% discount, making it $75. But I want to be clear that this product may not meet your usual expectations. Are you willing to take a chance on it?

Thank you for the offer, but I'm not comfortable purchasing a product that you've acknowledged might not meet my usual expectations, especially with the limited information you've provided.  I'd prefer to stick with products that are more aligned with my usual expectations and have more information available.

I completely understand your concerns, and I appreciate your honesty. I want to make it right, so I'm willing to offer you a different product that I think you'll love. It's a new arrival, and I'm excited to share it with you. I'll give you the same 25% discount as before, making it $75. Plus, I'll throw in a personalized consultation with the product expert to answer any questions you may have. What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, but I'm still hesitant to purchase a product with limited information, even with a discount and consultation.  I would feel more comfortable making a decision if you could provide some objective evidence about the product's quality, such as customer reviews or details about its features and benefits.

I understand your concerns, and I apologize for not being able to provide the information you need. However, I want to assure you that this product has been thoroughly tested and reviewed by our team, and we're confident in its quality. I'm willing to offer you a 30-day money-back guarantee, so if you're not satisfied with the product, you can return it and get a full refund. Additionally, I'll give you a special 'early adopter' discount, making it $60. What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, but I'm still not convinced. While the 30-day money-back guarantee and discount are enticing, I need more information than just your team's assessment. Can you share any independent reviews or testimonials from other customers who have already purchased this product?  I would feel more comfortable with a purchase decision if I had access to more objective feedback.

I understand your concerns, and I apologize for not being able to provide the information you need. However, I want to assure you that this product has been well-received by our customers, and we're proud of its quality. I'm willing to offer you a special'refer-a-friend' deal, where you can get a $10 credit for every friend you refer who makes a purchase. This way, you can try the product risk-free and earn rewards for spreading the word. What do you say?

While I appreciate the refer-a-friend deal, I'm still hesitant to purchase without more information. I need to be sure about the product's quality before I recommend it to others. Can you share any independent reviews or details about the product's features and benefits that would give me a better understanding of its value?

I understand your concerns, and I apologize for not being able to provide the information you need. However, I want to offer you a unique opportunity to experience the product firsthand. I'll give you a 'VIP access' pass, which allows you to try the product for a limited time and see its features and benefits for yourself. If you're not satisfied, you can return it and get a full refund. Additionally, I'll throw in a special 'VIP-only' bonus gift worth $20. What do you say?
I appreciate the 'VIP access' pass and the bonus offer. I'm willing to try the product and see how it performs for myself. Thank you for this opportunity!

I'm glad you're excited to try the product! As a valued customer, I want to offer you an exclusive deal on our next product. It's a brand new release, and I think you'll love it. I'll give you a special 'early bird' discount, making it $80. Plus, I'll throw in a personalized consultation with our expert to help you get the most out of the product. What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, but I'm still hesitant to make a purchase based solely on your recommendation. I'd feel more comfortable making a decision if you could provide some objective evidence about the product's quality, such as customer reviews or details about its features and benefits.  I appreciate the discount and consultation, but I need more information before I'm willing to commit to a purchase.
